thread.title: Research Analysts Issue Forecasts for El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc.’s FY2017 Earnings (LOCO)
thread.title_full: Research Analysts Issue Forecasts for El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc.’s FY2017 Earnings (LOCO)

posts.author: Logan Wallace
posts.title: Research Analysts Issue Forecasts for El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc.’s FY2017 Earnings (LOCO)
posts.text:
Tweet 
El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:LOCO) – Analysts at Jefferies Group reduced their FY2017 EPS estimates for El Pollo Loco Holdings in a research note issued to investors on Thursday. Jefferies Group analyst A. Barish now anticipates that the restaurant operator will post earnings of $0.61 per share for the year, down from their prior forecast of $0.66. Jefferies Group currently has a “Buy” rating and a $15.00 target price on the stock. Jefferies Group also issued estimates for El Pollo Loco Holdings’ Q4 2017 earnings at $0.09 EPS, Q1 2018 earnings at $0.16 EPS, Q2 2018 earnings at $0.22 EPS, Q3 2018 earnings at $0.17 EPS and Q4 2018 earnings at $0.10 EPS. Get El Pollo Loco Holdings Inc. alerts: 
Other research analysts have also recently issued reports about the stock. Zacks Investment Research cut shares of El Pollo Loco Holdings from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating in a research report on Tuesday. SunTrust Banks, Inc. reaffirmed a “hold” rating and issued a $12.00 price target on shares of El Pollo Loco Holdings in a report on Friday. Robert W. Baird cut their price target on shares of El Pollo Loco Holdings from $15.00 to $12.00 and set a “neutral” rating on the stock in a report on Friday. BidaskClub cut shares of El Pollo Loco Holdings from a “sell” rating to a “strong sell” rating in a report on Tuesday, August 8th. Finally, Morgan Stanley cut their price target on shares of El Pollo Loco Holdings from $14.00 to $13.00 and set an “equal weight” rating on the stock in a report on Monday, August 7th. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, four have assigned a hold rating and one has assigned a buy rating to the company’s stock. El Pollo Loco Holdings has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average price target of $13.00. 
El Pollo Loco Holdings ( NASDAQ:LOCO ) opened at $9.73 on Monday. El Pollo Loco Holdings has a 12-month low of $9.75 and a 12-month high of $14.85. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.31, a quick ratio of 0.29 and a current ratio of 0.32. The company has a market cap of $378.80, a price-to-earnings ratio of 15.31, a PEG ratio of 1.07 and a beta of 0.35. 
El Pollo Loco Holdings (NASDAQ:LOCO) last posted its earnings results on Thursday, November 2nd. The restaurant operator reported $0.15 EPS for the quarter, missing analysts’ consensus estimates of $0.18 by ($0.03). El Pollo Loco Holdings had a return on equity of 9.14% and a net margin of 2.27%. The firm had revenue of $101.16 million for the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $103.71 million. During the same period in the previous year, the firm posted $0.18 earnings per share. The company’s revenue for the quarter was up 5.6% on a year-over-year basis. 
Institutional investors and hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Arizona State Retirement System raised its holdings in El Pollo Loco Holdings by 0.9% in the first quarter. Arizona State Retirement System now owns 11,200 shares of the restaurant operator’s stock valued at $134,000 after acquiring an additional 100 shares in the last quarter. BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA raised its holdings in El Pollo Loco Holdings by 103.0% in the third quarter. BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA now owns 11,188 shares of the restaurant operator’s stock valued at $136,000 after acquiring an additional 5,678 shares in the last quarter. Thrivent Financial For Lutherans raised its holdings in El Pollo Loco Holdings by 4.3% in the first quarter. Thrivent Financial For Lutherans now owns 12,150 shares of the restaurant operator’s stock valued at $145,000 after acquiring an additional 500 shares in the last quarter. Garner Asset Management Corp acquired a new stake in El Pollo Loco Holdings in the second quarter valued at $145,000. Finally, Virtu KCG Holdings LLC acquired a new stake in El Pollo Loco Holdings in the second quarter valued at $157,000. 76.79% of the stock is currently owned by hedge funds and other institutional investors. 
About El Pollo Loco Holdings 
El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc specializes in fire-grilling citrus-marinated chicken and operates in the limited service restaurant (LSR) segment. The Company’s menu features its signature product, citrus-marinated fire-grilled chicken, and a range of Mexican-inspired entrees that it creates from chicken. thread.title_full: Дете на 5 години обгоря при пожар и почина

posts.author: reklama@webground.bg (Actualno.com)
posts.title: Дете на 5 години обгоря при пожар и почина
posts.text: Дете на 5 години обгоря при пожар и почина 07.11.2017 11:16 Tweet    5-годишно дете от ромския квартал „Гиздова махала“ обгоря при голям пожар в дома си. Огънят е пламнал вчера около 15.30 часа, съобщиха от полицията в Кюстендил. Реклама Вследствие на огнения инцидент детето е получило 25 процента изгаряния. След преглед в местната болница е транспортирано за лечение в столично лечебно заведение. Въпреки опитите на лекарите за връщането му към живота тази сутрин то починало. Прочети повече Ръководството на медицинското заведение е информирало за фаталния край на малчугана полицията в Дупница. Пожарът възникнал в момент когато майката оставила детето на роднина и излязла до магазина. В този момент печката била пълна с дърва, а вратата й била отворена. От нея изхвърчали искри, които подпалили завивките му докато спи. То е изнесено от чичо му извън къщата, която била обгърната в пламъци. Actualno.com

thread.title: Kartal Sahilinden Kimliği Belirsiz Erkek Cesedi Çıktı
thread.title_full: Kartal Sahilinden Kimliği Belirsiz Erkek Cesedi Çıktı

posts.title: Kartal Sahilinden Kimliği Belirsiz Erkek Cesedi Çıktı
posts.text:
Kartal Sahilinden Kimliği Belirsiz Erkek Cesedi Çıktı Tarih: 07-11-2017 09:00:00 Kartal sahilinde 35 yaşlarında olduğu tahmin edilen ve kimliği belirlenemeyen bir erkek cesedi bulundu. Polis ve itfaiye ekipleri cesedi denizden çıkarırken çevrede bulunan vatandaşlar da çalışmaları film izler gibi izledi. Tweetle 
Olay, sabah saatlerinde Kartal Atalar Mahallesi Atalar Sahili’nde meydana geldi. Edinilen bilgilere göre, sabah spor yapmak için sahile giden vatandaşlar denizde hareketsiz yatan bir kişi olduğunu fark etti. Vatandaşların ihbarı üzerine olay yerine polis, itfaiye, deniz polisi ve sağlık ekibi sevk edildi. 
Olay yerine gelen deniz polisi ve itfaiye ekipleri cesedi çıkarmak için çalışma başlattı. Yapılan çalışmaların ardından kıyıya çıkarılan cesedin bir erkeğe ait olduğu anlaşıldı. Olay yeri ekiplerinin yaptığı çalışmalar sonuncunda ise, yaklaşık 35 yaşlarında olduğu tahmin edilen cesedin üzerinden kimlik çıkmadı. 
Cesedin çıkarılışını film gibi izlediler 
Deniz polisi ve itfaiye ekiplerin ceset çıkarma çalışmaları devam ederken olay yerine çok sayıda vatandaş geldiği görüldü. Vatandaşlar ekiplerin ceset çıkarma çalışmalarını film izler gibi izledi. 
Ceset otopsi yapılmak üzere Adli Tıp Kurumu’na kaldırılırken polis ekipleri olayla ilgili incelme başlattı.   10

thread.title: Trump vorsichtig optimistisch im Nordkorea-Konflikt
thread.title_full: Trump vorsichtig optimistisch im Nordkorea-Konflikt

posts.author: importer
posts.title: Trump vorsichtig optimistisch im Nordkorea-Konflikt
posts.text:
Politik > Trump vorsichtig optimistisch im Nordkorea-Konflikt Trump und Moon Jae-In Trump vorsichtig optimistisch im Nordkorea-Konflikt   10:06 Uhr SchriftgrĂśĂe 
US-Präsident Donald Trump hat sich in der Krise um das nordkoreanische Atom- und Raketenprogramm vorsichtig optimistisch geäußert. Er sehe gewisse Bewegungen, sagte Trump am Dienstag bei einer gemeinsamen Pressekonferenz mit dem südkoreanischen Präsidenten Moon Jae-in. Ins Detail wolle er nicht gehen. Trump rief Pjöngjang aber auf, an den Verhandlungstisch zu kommen und einen “Deal” zu machen. 
Zugleich wiederholte der US-Präsident, dass sein Land nötigenfalls auch die volle Bandbreite militärischer Mittel einsetzen würden. “Wir haben viele Dinge in Position, von denen wir bei Gott hoffen, dass wir sie nie einsetzen müssen”, sagte Trump. Nordkorea sei eine Bedrohung für die ganze Welt, sagte Trump. Millionen unschuldiger Leben seien durch Nordkorea bedroht. 
Trump rief China und Russland dazu auf, ihren Einfluss in Nordkorea geltend zu machen. Es sei zwingend, dass die UNO-Sanktionen vollständig umgesetzt würden. “Chinas Präsident Xi Jinping war sehr, sehr hilfreich”, sagte Trump. 
“Es hat Sinn, dass Nordkorea das Richtige tut, nicht nur für Nordkorea selbst, sondern für die ganze Welt”, sagte Trump. Nordkorea verstehe, dass die USA so stark seien wie noch nie. 
Der US-Präsident versicherte Südkorea der unverbrüchlichen Sicherheitspartnerschaft mit den USA. Gleichwohl müssten die bilateralen Handelsbeziehungen neu verhandelt werden, da der bestehende Vertrag nicht fair und nicht sehr erfolgreich gewesen sei. 
Trump befindet sich derzeit auf einer zwölftägigen Asien-Reise. Südkorea ist nach Japan die zweite Station. 
Von: APA/dpa/ag.

thread.title: TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl kahvaltısı
thread.title_full: TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl kahvaltısı

posts.author: Ataner Yüce
posts.title: TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl kahvaltısı
posts.text:
Türk savunma sanayi Tayland’da göz dolduruyor TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl kahvaltısı 
TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl etkinlikleri devam ediyor. Kaytazdere Sahilinde Denizyıldızı Kafe’de düzenlenen geniş katılımlı kahvaltıda vakfın 25. yılı kutlandı. TEMA Yalova İl Temsilcisi Faruk Tezcan yaptıoğı konuşmada, “Kurucularımızdan Hayrettin Karaca’nın deyişiyle TEMA bir halk hareketidir. 650 bin olan gönüllü sayımız her geçen gün artıyor” dedi. TEMA Kaytazdere yeni sorumlusu Özlem Akman TEMA Kaytazdere yeni […] 07 Kasım 2017 - 12:05 'de eklendi ve 21 kez görüntülendi. tweetle TEMA Vakfı’nın kuruluşunun 25. yıl etkinlikleri devam ediyor. Kaytazdere Sahilinde Denizyıldızı Kafe’de düzenlenen geniş katılımlı kahvaltıda vakfın 25. yılı kutlandı. 
TEMA Yalova İl Temsilcisi Faruk Tezcan yaptıoğı konuşmada, “ Kurucularımızdan Hayrettin Karaca’nın deyişiyle TEMA bir halk hareketidir. 650 bin olan gönüllü sayımız her geçen gün artıyor ” dedi. TEMA Kaytazdere yeni sorumlusu Özlem Akman 
TEMA Kaytazdere yeni sorumlusu Özlem Akman’ın güzel ev sahipliği ile gerçekleşen kahvaltıda ressam şair İhsan Arıkan dua eden ağaç tablosunun hikayesini anlattı ve şiirini okudu. 
Yalova Musiki Derneği Başkanı Faruk Ömer Öskan derneğinden toplu katılım gönüllü formlarını teslim etti. Musiki Derneğinin mini konseri de kahvaltıya ayrı bir hava kattı. 
Çevre gezileri yapıldı. Fidan yetiştiricisi Mehmet Emin Çankaya herkese aşılı bir dut fidanı hediye etti. Subaşındaki göç müzesi ziyaretiyle program sona erdi. Logosunda zeytin yaprağı olan çevreci Kaytazdere Belediyesi ulaşım konusunda destek verdi. 
Zeytinlik alanların korunmasına verdiği destekten dolayı Başkan Ali Kangal Tema gönüllülerinin taktirini kazandı. 
YALOVA, UHA Haber

thread.title: Заради промени в ГПК, удръжките по запорирани пенсии се променят
thread.title_full: Заради промени в ГПК, удръжките по запорирани пенсии се променят

posts.author: reklama@webground.bg (Actualno.com)
posts.title: Заради промени в ГПК, удръжките по запорирани пенсии се променят
posts.text: Заради промени в ГПК, удръжките по запорирани пенсии се променят 07.11.2017 11:15 Tweet    При наложен запор върху пенсия, вече има нов размер на удръжките, които се правят. Това съобщава Националният осигурителен институт (НОИ). От там уточняват, че промените се правят заради промени в Гражданско-процесуалния кодекс (ГПК), тъй като досега удръжките бяха изчислявани на база фиксирани суми за получаваните доходи от пенсия. Реклама Новите формули са следните: - при пенсия, чиято големина попада в диапазона между минималната работна заплата и двукратния размер на минималната работна заплата – удържа се една трета (33%), ако лицето е без деца, и една четвърт (25%), ако е с деца, които издържа. - при пенсия, чиято големина попада в диапазона между двукратния размер на минималната работна заплата и четирикратния размер на минималната работна заплата, се удържа 50% при запор, ако лицето е без деца, и една трета (33%), ако е с деца, които издържа. - при пенсия, чиято големина е над четирикратния размер на минималната работна заплата – удържа се горницата над двукратния размер на минималната работна заплата, ако лицето е без деца, и горницата над два пъти и половина размера на минималната работна заплата, ако е с деца, които издържа. Пенсионерите, върху чиито пенсии е наложен запор, ще получат дължимите им пенсии и добавки за месец ноември 2017 г. с пощенски запис, след удържане на съответната сума по запора. За новия размер на удръжката те ще получат и уведомително писмо. Actualno.com

posts.text:
Sziasztok!
Egy olyan problémám van a Thalia 1,2 16-tal, hogy (csak hidegben illetve sok állás után) pöcre indul szépen ketyeg majd kb 10 másodperc múlva elkezd dadogni illetve elkezd villogni a környezeti lámpa majd leállítom és utána pöc megint és semmi baja. Ilyenkor azt érzem hogy egy kicsit remeg a váltó meg a kocsi de semmi extra.
Trafo csere meg volt meg 4 db gyertya is. Ma reggel ugyan ez annyi különbséggel hogy nem kellett leállítani mert kb 3szor felvillant a környeztivédelmi lámpa és helyreállt nem dadogott semmi.
Párom ment a Lidlbe nem hideg motorral és nem állt sokat de néha egy két hetente csinálja ezt hogy beindul ugyan úgy engedjük fel a kuplungot de lefullad 2x3x majd megint jó.
Köszönöm a válaszokat és az ötleteket

posts.author: Kire Noloc

thread.title: Delhi Smog: IMA declares health emergency in Delhi as smog blankets NCR | Delhi News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Delhi Smog: IMA declares health emergency in Delhi as smog blankets NCR | Delhi News - Times of India

posts.author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
posts.title: Delhi Smog: IMA declares health emergency in Delhi as smog blankets NCR | Delhi News - Times of India
posts.text: IMA declares health emergency in Delhi as smog blankets NCR IMA declares health emergency in Delhi as smog blankets NCR A public health emergency was declared in New Delhi Tuesday as a choking blanket of smog descended on the world's most polluted capital city. AFP | Updated: Nov 7, 2017, 15:16 IST Related Videos IMA declares public health eme... NEW DELHI: A public health emergency was declared in New Delhi Tuesday as a choking blanket of smog descended on capital city. + The Indian Medical Association 's (IMA) declaration came as the US embassy website said levels of the fine pollutants known as PM2.5 that are most harmful to health reached 703 -- well over double the threshold of 300 that authorities class as hazardous. & mdash; Arvind Kejriwal (@ArvindKejriwal) November 7, 2017 "We have declared a state of public health emergency in Delhi since pollution is at an alarming level + ," the head of the Indian Medical Association (IMA) Krishan Kumar Aggarwal told AFP. "Delhi authorities have to make every possible effort to curb this menace." The World Health Organization in 2014 classed New Delhi as the world's most polluted capital, with air quality levels worse than Beijing. Since then authorities have closed power plants temporarily and experimented with taking some cars off the road. But on Tuesday many residents said too little was being done to tackle the scourge. "It's a recurring problem and we need to find a quick and permanent solution to it before it is too late," said real estate agent Vipin Malhotra. "Delhi is becoming unliveable, particularly for children, as the pollution has reached uncontrollable levels." Delhi's air quality typically worsens ahead of the onset of winter as cooler air traps pollutants near the ground, preventing them from dispersing into the atmosphere, a phenomenon known as inversion. Firecrackers set off to celebrate the Diwali festival of lights in the city add to the toxic mix created by pollution from diesel engines, coal-fired power plants and industrial emissions. The problem is further exacerbated by the burning of crop stubble by farmers after the harvest in northern India, a practice that remains commonplace despite an official ban. Also, Delhi Chief Minister A rvind Kejriwal today asked his deputy and Education Minister Manish Sisodia to consider shutting schools for a few days in view of the high pollution in the city. Considering high level of pollution, I have requested Sh Manish Sisodia, Education Minister, to consider closing schools for a few days

thread.title: Wakutwa kesi ya kujibu kifo cha mtuhumiwa wizi wa simu
thread.title_full: Wakutwa kesi ya kujibu kifo cha mtuhumiwa wizi wa simu

posts.author: Christopha Mbinda (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Wakutwa kesi ya kujibu kifo cha mtuhumiwa wizi wa simu
posts.text:
MAHAKAMA ya Hakimu Mkazi Kisutu, jijini Dar es Salaam, iliyopewa mamlaka ya kusikiliza kesi za mauaji, imewaona washtakiwa Rashidi Rwambo na Mwanahamisi Shabani wana kesi ya kujibu dhidi ya mauaji ya Saidi Mketo.

Uamuzi huo ulitolewa jana na Hakimu Mkazi Mkuu, Geni Dudu, aliyepewa kibali cha kusikiliza kesi za mauaji mahakamani hapo.

Alisema baada ya kusikiliza ushahidi wa mashahidi watano wa upande wa Jamhuri bila kuacha shaka mahakama yake imewaona wana kesi ya kujibu.

"Mahakama hii imewaona washtakiwa wana kesi ya kujibu baada ya kusikiliza ushahidi wa mashahidi watano wa Jamhuri," alisema Hakimu Dudu.

Kabla ya uamuzi huo, shahidi wa tano, Konstebo Godwin alidai kuwa  Aprili 22, 2012 alikuwa mpelelezi wa zamu katika kituo cha polisi Kibiti.

Alidai kuwa saa 2:30 usiku lilifika kundi la watu kati ya 45 na 50, huku wakiwa wamewatanguliza washtakiwa mbele.

Alidai kuwa watu hao walikuwa wamempeleka Mketo (wakati wa uhai wake), lakini hakuwa anajitambua kutokana na majeraha mbalimbali mwilini huku akitokwa damu puani na masikioni.

"Nilituliza jazba ya wananchi, nikawaweka watuhumiwa mahabusu kwa usalama wao. Nikaandika fomu namba tatu kwa ajili ya kumpeleka majeruhi kutibiwa... niliwaweka washtakiwa mahabusu kwa sababu wananchi walikuwa wanapiga kelele kwamba watafungua bucha dhidi yao," alidai shahidi huyo na kuongeza:

"Nilimhoji mshtakiwa Rwambo kuhusu tukio hilo, alinieleza kwamba yeye na Mketo ni marafiki na kwamba siku hiyo walikuwa wote
kwenda kwa mshtakiwa wa pili, ambaye ni mfanyabiashara wa pombe za kienyeji ikiwamo gongo."

Kachero huyo alidai kuwa wakiwa hapo nyumbani kwa mshtakiwa wa pili, Rwambo alitoka kwenda chooni aliporejea hakuiona simu yake ya mkononi aina ya Nokia na ndipo ugomvi ulipoanzia.

Alidai kuwa baada ya tukio la kupotea simu, mshtakiwa wa kwanza alitaka kumpeleka polisi, lakini mshtakiwa wa pili alimzuia kwa sababu anafanya biashara haramu ya gongo angesumbuliwa na askari.

Alidai kuwa Aprili 23, 2012 alidamka kwenda kumwangalia majeruhi Mketo kituo cha afya Kibiti alimkuta akiwa na hali mbaya sana.

Alidai kuwa Aprili 28, 2012 Mketo alifariki katika Hospitali ya Taifa Muhimbili, alikohamishiwa baada ya hali yake kuzidi kuwa mbaya.

Awali washtakiwa walifunguliwa mashtaka ya kujeruhi mwili, lakini baadaye hati ya mashtaka ilibadilika na kuwa ya mauaji.
Upande wa Jamhuri ukiongozwa na Wakili wa Serikali Elizabeth Olomi, ulifunga ushahidi wake.

Mahakama imewaona wana kesi ya kujibu watapanda kujitetea kizimbani leo.

Katika kesi ya msingi, ilidaiwa kuwa Aprili 22, 2012 eneo la Kibiti,Wilaya ya Rufiji walimuua kwa makusudi Mketo.

thread.title: 강동구 고덕동 `고덕아이파크` 전용84㎡ 매매 실거래가가… 뉴스
thread.title_full: 강동구 고덕동 `고덕아이파크` 전용84㎡ 매매 실거래가가… : 네이버 뉴스

posts.author: 매일경제 | 네이버 뉴스
posts.title: 강동구 고덕동 `고덕아이파크` 전용84㎡ 매매 실거래가가… 뉴스
posts.text:
강남구, 서초구, 송파구와 함께 '강남4구'로 불리는 강동구는 고덕동과 상일동을 중심으로 약 2만 가구가 새롭게 들어서게 된다. 최근에는 고덕주공3단지 재건축 아파트인 '고덕 아르테온'이 평균 10.5대 1이라는 높은 청약 경쟁률을 기록했으며, 신동아3차 재건축 단지인 'e편한세상 강동 에코포레'도 공급을 앞두고 있다.
7일 강동탑아이파크공인중개사사무소에 따르면, 기존 단지에 대한 매수 문의도 활발하다. 강동탑아이파크공인은 지난달 21일 고덕아이파크 아파트의 전용면적 84.98㎡ 13층 매물을 매매가 8억4000만원에 중개했다고 밝혔다. 이 단지는 지난 2011년 12월 입주했고 최고 20층, 14개동, 총 1014가구 규모다.
지하철 5호선 고덕역 역세권이며 차량 이용 시 올림픽대로, 천호대로 진출입이 수월하다. 상일IC를 통해 서울외곽순환고속도로도 이용할 수 있다. 9호선 연장선 고덕역(계획)이 개통하면 교통망은 더욱 확대될 것으로 보인다. 교육시설로는 묘곡초, 배재중, 배재고, 명일중, 고덕중, 광문고, 서울컨벤션고 등이 도보 거리에 있다.
국토교통부 실거래가 자료에 따르면, 이 단지의 전용면적 별로 ▲84㎡ 8억3000만~8억6000만원 ▲114㎡ 9억~9억5000만원 ▲145㎡ 10억~11억7500만원 ▲177㎡ 12억4000만원 선에 실거래가 이뤄졌다. 전용 84㎡의 평균 매매가가 지난해 10월 약 7억5000만원 선이었으나 1년 사이에 1억원 가량 오른 셈이다.
강동탑아이파크공인 관계자는 "정부가 8.2대책과 10.24 가계부채 대책을 내놓았지만 고덕동은 큰 영향 없이 좋은 분위기가 이어지고 있다"며 "매수 문의도 활발해 앞으로가 더욱 기대된다"라고 현장 분위기를 설명했다.
한편, 부동산114 시황 자료에 따르면 강동구의 매매가(▲0.30%)는 상승세를 유지했다. 새 아파트가 계속해서 들어서는 가운데 중소형 평형 위주로 거래가 많다. 고덕동 고덕래미안힐스테이트와 천호동 래미안강동팰리스 아파트의 매매가가 2000만~2500만원 가량 소폭 올랐다.
[매경 부동산센터 이다연 기자]
▶뉴스 이상의 무궁무진한 프리미엄 읽을거리
▶아나운서가 직접 읽어주는 오늘의 주요 뉴스

thread.title: Sinemada ‘Ayla’ fırtınası esiyor … Kasım ayı hafta sonu seyirci rekoru kırıldı
thread.title_full: Sinemada ‘Ayla’ fırtınası esiyor … Kasım ayı hafta sonu seyirci rekoru kırıldı

posts.author: Ataner Yüce
posts.title: Sinemada ‘Ayla’ fırtınası esiyor … Kasım ayı hafta sonu seyirci rekoru kırıldı
posts.text:
Hafta sonu 1 milyon 276 bin 383 seyirciyle Kasım ayı hafta sonu toplam seyirci rekoru kırılırken Ayla, vizyondaki ikinci hafta sonunda seyirci sayısını ilk hafta sonuna göre 150 binden fazla arttırarak 466 bin 269 seyirciye ulaştı. 

Interpress’in Box Office Türkiye verilerinden elde ettiği bilgilere göre Türkiye’nin Oscar adayı olan Ayla on günde toplam 1 milyon 89 bin 205 seyirci tarafından izlenerek zirvedeki yerini korudu. 
Sinema ile ilgili medyada Ekim ayından bu yana 50 bine yakın haber çıkarken Ayla hakkında ise medyaya 3 bin 60 haber yansıdı. 
Hafta sonu en fazla izlenen ikinci film yine vizyona geçen hafta sonu giren İbrahim Büyükak ve Oğuzhan Koç’un başrollerini paylaştığı duygusal komedi Yol Arkadaşım olurken film bu hafta sonunda 288 bin 962 seyirci tarafından izlenerek toplamda 600 bin 833 kişiye ulaşmış oldu. 
Üçüncü sırada yine vizyondaki ikinci hafta sonunu geçiren Thor:Ragnarok yer alırken efsane kahramanın hikayesini anlatan filmi bu hafta sonu 145 bin 444 biletli seyirci izledi. 
Hafta sonunun merak edilen yeni filmlerinden OHA Diyorum açılışını 111 bin 960 seyirciyle gerçekleştirerek dördüncü sırada yer alırken, Şafak Sezer’in başrolünde yer aldığı, hafta sonunun bir diğer yeni filmi Ketenpere ise 110 bin 399 seyirciyle listeye beşinci sıradan giriş yaptı.

thread.title: El FMI ya audita las cuentas de Argentina
thread.title_full: El FMI ya audita las cuentas de Argentina

posts.author: Roberto Durán (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: El FMI ya audita las cuentas de Argentina
posts.text:
Los técnicos de la misión del Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI) comenzarán a analizar desde mañana las cuentas fiscales y el jueves próximo tienen previsto reunirse con el ministro de Hacienda, Nicolas Dujovne. La misión que está encabezada por el encargado del FMI para Argentina, Roberto Cardarelli, quien revisó la semana pasada las cuentas del BCRA.

También el jueves pasado se reunió con el ministro de Finanzas, Luis Caputo, con quien analizaron la situación de la deuda pública argentina y los planes de financiamiento para el próximo año. La misión de técnicos del organismo internacional, se realiza en el marco del Artículo IV, que obliga a los países miembros del FMI a prestarse a este análisis sobre la situación económica del país.

La misión se lleva adelante dentro de un marcado hermetismo, ya que no hubo hasta el momento información oficial sobre los encuentros que los técnicos mantienen con distintos funcionarios del gobierno. Esta es la segunda misión del FMI en la Argentina, después de la del año anterior, luego de diez años que no se realizaba ninguna auditoría sobre las cuentas públicas del país.

thread.title: Neuerliche Knie-OP verzögert Rückkehr von Iraschko-Stolz
thread.title_full: Neuerliche Knie-OP verzögert Rückkehr von Iraschko-Stolz

posts.author: importer
posts.title: Neuerliche Knie-OP verzögert Rückkehr von Iraschko-Stolz
posts.text:
Sport > Neuerliche Knie-OP verzĂśgert RĂźckkehr von Iraschko-Stolz Einstiegs-Termin in die Wettkampf-Saison noch ungewiss Neuerliche Knie-OP verzĂśgert RĂźckkehr von Iraschko-Stolz   09:45 Uhr SchriftgrĂśĂe 
Skisprung-Ex-Weltmeisterin Daniela Iraschko-Stolz hat sich neuerlich einer Operation am rechten Knie unterziehen müssen. Ihr Einstieg in intensives Kraft- und Sprungtraining verzögert sich nach dem arthroskopischen Knorpelgewebe-Eingriff vom Montag um zumindest weitere fünf Wochen. Die Weltcupsaison beginnt Anfang Dezember, wann Iraschko-Stolz in den Olympiawinter einsteigen kann, ist offen. 
Die Operation – durchgeführt von Christian Hoser in der Privatklinik Hochrum – sei notwendig gewesen, damit sie “weiterhin auf hohem Niveau Skispringen” könne, so Iraschko-Stolz. 
“Ich hatte den Sommer über im Training immer wieder Probleme, speziell beim Stiegensteigen, beim Training mit Gewichten und in der Streckung hatte ich Schmerzen. An ein richtiges Training war da nicht zu denken”, erläuterte die bereits im April wegen einer Knorpelfraktur im rechten Kniegelenk operierte Olympia-Zweite von Sotschi in einer Aussendung des Österreichischen Ski-Verbandes vom Dienstag. 
“Daniela laborierte an einer Knorpelverletzung im rechten Knie, die wir arthroskopisch versorgt haben. Dabei wurden freie Knorpelfragmente entfernt und der Knorpel geglättet. Sie kann bereits jetzt langsam mit Physiotherapie und leichtem Training am Ergometer anfangen. Intensives Kraft- und Sprungtraining wird frühestens nach fünf Wochen wieder möglich sein,” erklärte Hoser. 
Iraschko-Stolz hofft auf ihre baldige Rückkehr. “Ich bin wirklich froh und bereits jetzt fühlt sich das Knie schon etwas besser an. Ich bin zuversichtlich, dass ich bald wieder Skispringen und in den Weltcup einsteigen kann”, meinte die verletzungsgeplagte Ex-Weltcupgesamtsiegerin, die wegen Bänder- und Knorpelverletzungen an beiden Knien schon einige Operationen hinter sich hat. 
Im ÖSV-Skisprungteam ist derzeit auch Gregor Schlierenzauer wegen einer neuerlichen Bänderverletzung rekonvaleszent und verpasst die ersten Bewerbe der Saison. Michael Hayböck hat sich im Herbst ebenfalls leicht am Knöchel verletzt. 
Von: apa

thread.title_full: Guatemala Uzman Doktor Heyetine Kolposkopi Eğitimi Verildi

posts.title: Guatemala Uzman Doktor Heyetine Kolposkopi Eğitimi Verildi
posts.text:
Guatemala Uzman Doktor Heyetine Kolposkopi Eğitimi Verildi Tarih: 07-11-2017 09:00:00 Türk İşbirliği ve Koordinasyon Ajansı Başkanlığı (TİKA) ve Sağlık Bakanlığı işbirliğinde, Guatemala’nın ikinci büyük şehri Quetzaltenango’daki tek devlet hastanesi olan San Juan De Dios Batı Bölge Hastanesinden 4 uzman doktora Ankara’da kolposkopi eğitimi düzenlendi. Tweetle 
TİKA, faaliyet gösterdiği coğrafyalarda gerçekleştirdiği projelere yenilerini eklemeye devam ediyor. Faaliyet coğrafyasında özellikle sağlık alanında mesleki eğitim projelerine desten veren TİKA tarafından Sağlık Bakanlığı işbirliğinde Quetzaltenango’daki tek devlet hastanesi olan San Juan De Dios Batı Bölge Hastanesinden 4 uzman doktora Ankara Zekai Tahir Burak Kadın Sağlığı Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesinde kolposkopi alanında 1 hafta süreli eğitim verildi. 
Eğitimde, Türkiye’nin kolposkopi alanında bilgi, tecrübe ve kapasitesi Guatemalalı uzman doktor heyeti ile paylaşıldı. Eğitim programı kapsamında ayrıca Türk Kolposkopi ve Servikal Patolojiler Derneği Başkanı Prof. Dr. Kunter Yüce de Guatemala uzman doktor heyetine seminer verdi. 
Program sonunda katılımcılar TİKA ve Sağlık Bakanlığına teşekkür ederek, Türkiye ve Guatemala arasında bilhassa sağlık alanındaki proje ve faaliyetlerin artarak devam etmesini arzu ettiklerini ifade etti. 
Guatemala 
Guatemala, Latin Amerika’nın en yoksul 10 ülkesinden biri ve nüfusunun yüzde 32’si günde 2 ABD dolarından az bir miktarla geçimini sürdürüyor. Ülke ekonomisinde yaşanan sıkıntılar sebebiyle devlet tarafından sunulan sağlık hizmetleri dünya standartlarının çok gerisinde kalıyor ve bu durum ülkede ihtiyacı karşılayacak doktor ve tıbbi ekipmanın olmamasından dolayı daha da kötü bir hal alıyor. TİKA ve Sağlık Bakanlığı işbirliğiyle gerçekleştirilen proje ile kadın anne sağlığının iyileştirilmesi konusunda maddi ve insani kaynakları kısıtlı Guatemala’ya destek olundu.   7

thread.title_full: FY2017 EPS Estimates for McDermott International, Inc. (MDR) Increased by Analyst

posts.author: Shane Hupp
posts.title: FY2017 EPS Estimates for McDermott International, Inc. (MDR) Increased by Analyst
posts.text:
Tweet 
McDermott International, Inc. (NYSE:MDR) – Analysts at KeyCorp increased their FY2017 EPS estimates for shares of McDermott International in a report issued on Wednesday. KeyCorp analyst T. Afzal now anticipates that the oil and gas company will post earnings of $0.52 per share for the year, up from their previous estimate of $0.42. KeyCorp has a “Hold” rating on the stock. KeyCorp also issued estimates for McDermott International’s Q4 2017 earnings at ($0.01) EPS, FY2018 earnings at $0.39 EPS and FY2019 earnings at $0.53 EPS. Get McDermott International Inc. alerts: 
Several other equities research analysts have also recently weighed in on the stock. Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of McDermott International from a “hold” rating to a “strong-buy” rating and set a $8.50 target price for the company in a research note on Thursday, July 20th. TheStreet upgraded shares of McDermott International from a “c” rating to a “b-” rating in a research note on Tuesday, July 25th. BidaskClub cut shares of McDermott International from a “sell” rating to a “strong sell” rating in a research note on Thursday, August 17th. Deutsche Bank AG reduced their target price on shares of McDermott International from $6.50 to $5.25 and set a “hold” rating for the company in a research note on Tuesday, October 24th. Finally, Scotiabank reiterated a “buy” rating and issued a $9.00 target price on shares of McDermott International in a research note on Friday, July 28th. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, six have given a hold rating, three have issued a buy rating and one has issued a strong buy rating to the stock. McDermott International presently has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average target price of $7.94. 
Shares of McDermott International ( MDR ) opened at $7.67 on Monday. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.30, a current ratio of 1.70 and a quick ratio of 1.70. McDermott International has a 1 year low of $4.96 and a 1 year high of $8.33. The stock has a market capitalization of $2,056.22, a PE ratio of 12.93 and a beta of 1.32. 
McDermott International (NYSE:MDR) last issued its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, November 1st. The oil and gas company reported $0.33 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, beating the Thomson Reuters’ consensus estimate of $0.19 by $0.14. The company had revenue of $958.50 million for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $977.28 million. McDermott International had a return on equity of 9.56% and a net margin of 5.25%. The firm’s revenue was up 71.6% compared to the same quarter last year. During the same period last year, the business posted $0.09 earnings per share. 
A number of institutional investors and hedge funds have recently made changes to their positions in the business. Rhumbline Advisers lifted its stake in McDermott International by 1.7% during the third quarter. Rhumbline Advisers now owns 572,293 shares of the oil and gas company’s stock worth $4,161,000 after purchasing an additional 9,415 shares during the period. Los Angeles Capital Management & Equity Research Inc. lifted its stake in McDermott International by 33.0% during the third quarter. Los Angeles Capital Management & Equity Research Inc. now owns 291,605 shares of the oil and gas company’s stock worth $2,120,000 after purchasing an additional 72,404 shares during the period. Municipal Employees Retirement System of Michigan bought a new position in McDermott International during the third quarter worth about $774,000. Sei Investments Co. lifted its stake in McDermott International by 29.4% during the third quarter. Sei Investments Co. now owns 48,687 shares of the oil and gas company’s stock worth $354,000 after purchasing an additional 11,072 shares during the period. Finally, BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA lifted its stake in McDermott International by 64.7% during the third quarter. BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA now owns 150,748 shares of the oil and gas company’s stock worth $1,096,000 after purchasing an additional 59,244 shares during the period. Hedge funds and other institutional investors own 85.42% of the company’s stock. 
About McDermott International 
McDermott International, Inc is a provider of integrated engineering, procurement, construction and installation (EPCI), front-end engineering and design (FEED) and module fabrication services for upstream field developments across the world. The Company delivers fixed and floating production facilities, pipeline installations and subsea systems from concept to commissioning for offshore and subsea oil and gas projects. posts.title: "طلعت مصطفى" تنفي مساهمة الوليد بن طلال في مشروعاتها
posts.text: "طلعت مصطفى" تنفي مساهمة الوليد بن طلال في مشروعاتها الثلاثاء 07/نوفمبر/2017 - 10:56 ص نيفين سمير أعلنت مجموعة طلعت مصطفي القابضة أنه لايوجد مساهمات مع الوليد ابن طلال أو شركة المملكة القابضة في أى من شركات مجموعة طلعت مصطفي القابضة أو الشركات التابعة لها. وأوضحت الشركة في بيان للبورصة اليوم الثلاثاء، أنه قد تم تمويل ماتم انفاقة على مشروع فور سيزون شرم الشيخ 213 مليون دولار من المصادر التمويلية الذاتية من المجموعة. وأضافت أنه سيتم تمويل المبلغ المتبقي والبالغ 170 مليون دولار لانهاء المشروع، وذلك أيضا من مصادر التمويل الذاتية للمشروع. كما أعلنت الشركة المصرية لمدينة الانتاج الاعلامي في بيان منفصل للبورصة أنه لاتوجد مساهمات أو استثمارات الوليد بن طلال والشيخ صالح كامل داخل الشركة وأن العلاقة بين الشركة وبينهم تقتصر فقط على تأجير عدد من الاستديوهات بالشركة وأنهم ملتزمين بالسداد، مضيفة أن جميع الاستثمارات الموجودة مملوكة بالكامل للشركة ومساهميها. وكان‏ العاهل السعودي الملك سلمان بن عبدالعزيز أصدر مساء السبت الماضي، أمراً ملكياً بتشكيل لجنة عليا برئاسة ولي العهد الأمير محمد بن سلمان وعضوية رئيس هيئة الرقابة والتحقيق ورئيس الهيئة الوطنية لمكافحة الفساد ورئيس ديوان المراقبة العامة والنائب العام ورئيس أمن الدولة.وتضمنت مسؤوليات اللجنة حصر المخالفات والجرائم والأشخاص والكيانات ذات العلاقة في قضايا الفساد العام والتحقيق، وإصدار أوامر القبض، والمنع من السفر، وكشف الحسابات والمحافظ وتجميدها، وتتبع الأموال والأصول ومنع نقلها أو تحويلها من قبل الأشخاص والكيانات أياً كانت صفتها، وللجنة الحق في اتخاذ أي إجراءات احترازية تراها حتى تتم إحالتها إلى جهات التحقيق أو الجهات القضائية بحسب الأحوال.واتخاذ ما يلزم مع المتورطين في قضايا الفساد العام واتخاذ ما تراه بحق الأشخاص والكيانات والأموال والأصول الثابتة والمنقولة في الداخل والخارج وإعادة الأموال للخزينة العامة للدولة وتسجيل الممتلكات والأصول باسم عقارات الدولة، ولها تقرير ما تراه محققاً للمصلحة العامة خاصة مع الذين أبدوا تجاوبهم معها.هذا وذكرت وسائل إعلام سعودية توقيف عدداً من الأمراء والوزراء والمسؤولين، كما نقلت وكالة رويترز عن مسؤول سعودي كبير أن الأمير الوليد بن طلال ووزير المالية السابق إبراهيم العساف قيد الاحتجاز ويخضعان للتحقيق في المملكة العربية السعودية.

thread.title: “5İnci Sınıflarda Yabancı Dilde Hazırlık, Dil Öğrenmeyi Kolaylaştıracak”
thread.title_full: “5İnci Sınıflarda Yabancı Dilde Hazırlık, Dil Öğrenmeyi Kolaylaştıracak”

posts.title: “5İnci Sınıflarda Yabancı Dilde Hazırlık, Dil Öğrenmeyi Kolaylaştıracak”
posts.text:
“5İnci Sınıflarda Yabancı Dilde Hazırlık, Dil Öğrenmeyi Kolaylaştıracak” Tarih: 07-11-2017 09:00:00 Beylikdüzü Fen Bilimleri Okulları Yabancı Diller Bölüm Başkanı Özlem Sevi Güllüoğlu, “Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı’nın bu yıl ortaokul 5’inci sınıfları ‘yabancı dil hazırlık sınıfına’ dönüştürmesi yabancı dil yeterliliğinin istenilen düzeye gelmesi açısından önemli bir adımdır” dedi. Tweetle 
Bakanlığın öğrencilerin en az bir yabancı dili sözlü ve yazılı olarak iyi iletişim kurabilecek düzeyde öğrenmesini sağlamaya yönelik eğitim yöntemleri ve müfredat konusunda yaptığı düzenlemeler, eğitimciler tarafından olumlu karşılandı. 
Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı’nın 5’inci sınıfları yabancı dil hazırlık statüsüne koymasının dil öğrenimi açısından önemli bir adım olduğunu belirten Beylikdüzü Fen Bilimleri Okulları Yabancı Diller Bölüm Başkanı Özlem Sevi Güllüoğlu, yabancı dili belli düzeyde öğrenebilme ve kullanamama sorunları büyük ölçüde ortadan kalkacağını ifade etti. Yabancı dil dersinin içeriği öğrencilerin iletişimsel dil becerilerini geliştirecek nitelikte hazırlandığını ve dilbilgisi öğretimi üzerine kurgulandığının altını çizen Güllüoğlu, "Yabancı Dil Ağırlıklı 5. Sınıf Öğretim Programı, yabancı dil öğretiminde modernleşme ve bir standart oluşturma açısından dikkat çekici konular içeriyor. Yeni düzenlemede CEFR olarak adlandırılan Ortak Avrupa Dil Referans Çerçevesi’nin temel olarak alınması, dil becerileri üzerinde yoğunlaşılması, işlev ve iletişim odaklı öğretimin benimsenmesi dil eğitiminde önemli rol oynayacak. Kullanılacak tüm kural, yapı, sözcük ve kalıpların günlük yaşam kullanımına uygun bağlamlar içinde ele alınması Türk Eğitim Sistemi yabancı dil öğretiminde gecikmeli olsa da atılan en doğru adımlardan biri olarak değerlendiriyoruz. Bu hedefe yönelik özenle hazırlanmış bir müfredat ve alanlarında uzmanlaşmış bir öğretmen kadrosu ile yıllardır tartışmaların odağında olan yabancı dil öğretimi ve çocuklarımızın bir yabancı dili belli düzeyde öğrenip kullanamama sorunları büyük ölçüde ortadan kalkacak" dedi. 
Tüm bu değişim sürecini yakından takip etmiş, yayımlanan müfredatları ayrıntıları ile incelediklerine dikkat çeken Özlem Sevi Güllüoğlu, "Yabancı dil öğretimi, tüm kademeler dikkate alınarak dikey ve yatay planlamaların titizlikle hazırlandığı, kural ve dil becerilerinin bir bütün olarak ele alındığı bir süreç. Dil öğrenimi sadece okuma-yazma ve dil bilgisi becerilerini edinmek anlamına gelmiyor. Etkili dil öğretimi okuma, dinleme, yazma becerilerinin yanı sıra hedef dilin akıcı, bağlama uygun kullanımı ile gerçekleşiyor. Fen Bilimleri Okulları olarak, yabancı dil hazırlık sınıfları başta olmak üzere ortaokul tüm kademelerimizde dil bir bütün olarak ele alınmakta ve süreç sonunda anadil kullanımına yakın bir dil gelişimi hedefliyoruz" şeklinde konuştu.   7

thread.title: 'GIF Tak Bikin Tegang, Porno di Twitter Lebih Kenceng'
thread.title_full: 'GIF Tak Bikin Tegang, Porno di Twitter Lebih Kenceng'

posts.title: 'GIF Tak Bikin Tegang, Porno di Twitter Lebih Kenceng'
posts.text:
'GIF Tak Bikin Tegang, Porno di Twitter Lebih Kenceng' Siti Sarifah Alia   14:13 WIB Photo : Ilustrasi menonton video porno. Share 
VIVA – Pemblokiran konten GIF bernada pornografi di Whatsapp dianggap sebagai hal yang bodoh. Pasalnya, format GIF hanyalah gambar bergerak yang hanya memiliki durasi satu hingga dua detik, berbeda dengan video satu menit yang beredar di Twitter, Facebook maupun Instagram. 
Hal ini diungkap oleh seorang Youtuber yang terkenal dengan nama Cakdan. Menurut dia, jika hanya GIF pornografi Whatsapp yang diblokir, hal itu akan sia-sia. Masih banyak media lain yang menyediakan akses konten dan video porno dengan durasi yang lama dan terbuka, ketimbang hanya formt GIFWhatsapp. 
"Kalau cuma GIF mah, 'ngaceng’ (maaf tegang-red) juga kagak. Di Twitter atau Google lebih parah. Kenapa Whatsapp yang cuma GIF doang dipermasalahin, tapi Twitter engga," katanya, kepada VIVA , Selasa, 7 November 2017. 
Dia pun menunjukkan sebuah link twitter milik produsen pornografi ternama, Brazzers. Di akun Twitter itu bertebaran foto dan video berdurasi 'tanggung' yang bisa diunduh secara mudah, hanya sekali klik. Meskipun sebelumnya ada peringatan dari Twitter yang menyatakan jika video ini berisi materi yang sensitif. 
Berkaca dari peristiwa ‘Tata Chubby’, PSK online yang akhirnya meninggal dunia karena dibunuh pelanggannya. Tata membuka layanan online untuk pria hidung belang di Twitter. Jika mau menggali lebih dalam, akan ditemukan banyak akun layanan ‘Tata Chubby’ lainnya di Twitter saat ini. 
Pengguna lainnya menambahkan link lain yang didapat dari Instagram. Beberapa link tersebut menghadirkan foto yang tidak kalah seronok. 
"Twitter sama Instagram sekarang lebih 'sangar' kalau soal perbokepan," kata pengguna lain yang tidak ingin disebutkan namanya. 
Setidaknya, Cakdan melanjutkan, hampir semua media sosial dengan akses terbuka bisa menjadi media penyaluran konten porno. Di sinilah pemerintah ditantang untuk bisa menghalau lebih jauh dan lebih dalam lagi mengingat media sosial telah menjadi bagian yang tidak lagi bisa dipisahkan di era Kids Zaman Now. 
Setidaknya, kata dia, warga bisa diedukasi, diberikan panduan untuk bisa melakukan pemblokiran sendiri (self censorship) jika tiba-tiba tak disengaja menemukan konten porno, yang tidak dipungkiri lagi memang banyak bertebaran dan bisa diakses dengan mudahnya. Topik :

thread.title: How often should you change your bedsheets, towels, pyjamas and underwear?
thread.title_full: How often should you change your bedsheets, towels, pyjamas and underwear?

posts.author: Fiona Duffy
posts.title: How often should you change your bedsheets, towels, pyjamas and underwear?
posts.text:
Lifestyle How often should you change your bedsheets, towels, pyjamas and underwear? All these life staples can harbour some real nasties... but when and how should we be washing them? Share Comfy: Woman with duvet - but what does it harbour? Share     
They are the items we use every day - in fact, we couldn't do without them. 
The dishcloths we clean our dishes with - then the tea towels we use to dry them. 
Sheets on our beds and the duvets and pillows which keep us comfy at night, as well as the pyjamas which make us extra snug. 
We all need a towel after showering and a toothbrush to keep our pearly whites, well, white. 
And undies - unless you are Joey from Friends, of course. 
But all these life staples can harbour some real nasties. 
The question is: how often do they all need to be changed? Underwear 
More than a quarter of men and seven per cent of women wear briefs for two days before washing them, according to a Kelkoo survey. But used pants contains microbes that can cause urinary tract infections, pneumonia and blood infections, as well as E-coli and thrush . 
How often: After every single wear – no exceptions, says Dr Lisa Ackerley visiting Professor of Environmental Health, University of Salford . “And replace them every year.” 
How to clean them: Machine wash at 30-40C using a detergent with an AOB (activated oxygen bleach) product, says Professor Sally Bloomfield, Consultant in Hygiene and Infectious Disease Prevention, and at 60C if a family member is ill. Or add an anti-bacterial product such as Napisan or Dettol’s Anti-bacterial Laundry Cleanser. Pyjamas 
The average 18 to 30-year-old man wears the same pyjamas for 13 nights and young women 17 nights before washing them, according to a recent survey. “Pyjamas are worn right next to the skin – and we shed skin cells, filled with micro-organisms, at a vast rate,” says Prof Bloomfield. “These organisms are usually harmless but if they get into the wrong place they can cause problems.” For example, E-coli bacteria transferring from the bowel to the urinary tract can cause cystitis. 
How often: Every two wears – or at least once a week. 
How to clean: Machine wash in the same way as underwear, says Professor Bloomfield. Dishcloths 
Nine out of 10 UK dishcloths tested in a Dettol study were heavily contaminated with bacteria. More than half harboured E.coli while a quarter featured an organism called Pseudomonas spp. which can cause minor skin and eye infections and potentially life-threatening illness. The average used dishcloth harbours four billion living germs, contains six times as much bacteria as toilet handles and is hailed as the “bug superhighway of the kitchen” according to the Hygiene Council. 
All change! Rinse thoroughly and air-dry after every use. Don’t drape over bacteria-ridden kitchen taps or leave in the kitchen sink. Replace monthly. 
Scrub! Each night, rinse with an anti-bacterial laundry cleanser or wash at 60C or more. Air or tumble dry. Tea towels 
These are one of the leading causes of cross contamination. “Cloth towels could quickly and easily become contaminated at significant levels, including microorganisms that can lead to food-borne illnesses,” Science Daily reported. “Other researchers found that salmonella grows on cloths – even after they were washed.” 
How often: Change every day – and don’t dry your hands on them! 
How to clean: Launder at 60C or above, separately to regular towels. Towels 
Bath towels absorb dead skin cells and natural bacteria from our bodies and warm, damp conditions mean this bacteria thrives. Sharing towels can spread bacteria and viruses such as Staphylococcus aureus (which can cause skin infections), cold sores and Athlete’s Foot. 
How often: Bath towels should be washed after every three uses, insists Philip Tierno, New York based microbiologist. 
How to clean: Wash with sheets at a high temperature, 60C or more, and an anti bacterial product. Bedsheets (Image: Getty) 
A recent YouGov poll says more than a third of us only wash our bedsheets once a fortnight. “Beds can become reservoirs of human cells, bacteria and bodily excretions. Humans shed half an ounce of skin each week – and a lot of that will be in the bed,” says Dr Ackerley. Warm, moist environments are also ideal breeding grounds for dust mites, with the average bed containing 10 million of them! Their faeces can trigger allergic reactions. 
How often: Each morning, pull back the duvet and open the window to release moisture and humidity. Change your sheets each week. 
How to clean: Wash at 60C to kill mites. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Duvets and pillows 
A staggering 45 per cent of us have never washed their pillows and duvets – despite the fact a third of the weight of a two year old pillow is made up of dead skin and dust mite faeces. According to Johnson Cleaners: “Duvets can harbour live and dead dust mites, skin scales and fungus, which can lead to allergies such as rhinitis and infections such as conjunctivitis.” 
How often: Duvets should be washed every few months – or at least twice a year, says Sara Wadsworth from The Fine Bedding Company, and replaced every five years, pillows more frequently – every two to three years, 
How to clean: If the duvet has synthetic filling, wash at 60C to kill off dust mites. Feather fillings need professional dry cleaning twice a year. Read More Toothbrushes (Image: Getty) 
“The average toothbrush contains around 10 million germs – from bacteria to the flu virus,” says Dr Uchenna Okoye, clinical director of London Smiling Dental Group . “Even potentially fatal viruses, such as Hepatitis C, have been found on the humble brush, so sharing brushes is a big no no.” 
How often: Toothbrush heads need to be changed every three months – or after illness. But they also need to be cleaned regularly and stored separately, ideally in a closed cabinet. If out in the open, make sure they’re far away from the loo! 
How to clean: After every use, rinse bristles thoroughly then shake dry, stand upright and allow to air dry. Once a month, pop manual or electric toothbrush heads in the dishwasher, soak for five minutes in boiling water or use brush cleaning products like Brushtox. Like us on Facebook

Tòa nhà cho thuê văn phòng quận Tân Bình Gốm Hồng Loan Office House nằm ngay khu tập trung nhiều building, cao ốc văn phòng, các trung tâm thương mại, tài chánh, hành chánh của thành phố, khách sạn 5 sao và các khu cho thuê văn phòng khác.
Vị trí tòa nhà Gốm Hồng Loan Building:
+ Cách sân bay Tân Sơn Nhất (10 phút đi xe máy).
+ Cách vòng xoay Lăng Cha Cả (5 phút đi bộ).
+ Cách bến xe Bus (2 phút đi bộ).
+ Cách City Plaza (5 phút đi bộ).
Kết cấu tòa nhà :
- Số tầng của tòa nhà : 6 tầng.
- Diện tích sàn : 80m2
- Tổng diện tích sử dụng : 480m2
- Số tầng hầm : 1 hầm
- Thang máy : 1 thang máy.
- Toilet: Mỗi tầng có 1 Toilet nam và 1 Toilet nữ riêng biệt.
Tên Cao Ốc GỐM HỒNG LOAN OFFICE HOUSE.
Vị trí: Đường Cộng Hòa - Quận Tân Bình.
Giá thuê: 225 nghìn/m2 ~ 10 USD/m2, (đã bao gồm thuế VAT và PQL)
Diện tích cho thuê: Full
Quy mô: 1 trệt– 6 tầng.
Loại máy lạnh: Hệ thống máy lạnh trung tâm
Phí gửi xe: Xe máy: 65 nghìn/chiếc . Xe hơi : 90 nghìn/chiếc
Độ cao trần đến sàn: 2.65m
Hợp đồng thuê: Tối thiểu 2 năm
Cọc và thanh toán Cọc 3 tháng, trả tiền từng tháng.
HÃY LIÊN HỆ NGAY VỚI CHÚNG TÔI ĐỂ ĐI XEM TRỰC TIẾP VÀ NHIỀU PHẦN QUÀ RẤT HẤP DẪN ĐANG CHỜ BẠN.
 cho thue van phong quan Tan Binh Gốm Hồng Loan Office House:
Hình chụp toàn cảnh Gốm Hồng Loan Office House, thuận tiện để quý công ty và khách hàng đặt trụ sở, văn phòng làm việc hoặc làm trung tâm ngoại ngữ, trường học.
Hình chụp phía trước Gốm Hồng Loan Office House, thiết kế đẹp, sang trọng, phù hợp cho khách hàng đi thuê văn phòng.
Hình chụp mặt trước Gốm Hồng Loan Office House, mặt trước tòa nhà, không gian thoáng mát.

thread.title: Duchess of Cornwall takes starring role in puppet show - telling love story of a Princess kidnapped by ogre
thread.title_full: Duchess of Cornwall takes starring role in puppet show - telling love story of a Princess kidnapped by ogre

posts.author: Hannah Furness
posts.title: Duchess of Cornwall takes starring role in puppet show - telling love story of a Princess kidnapped by ogre
posts.text:
Duchess of Cornwall takes starring role in puppet show 01:40 Hannah Furness , Royal Correspondent, in Penang, Malaysia 7 November 2017 • 8:52am 
I n the telling of a traditional love story featuring a Princess, it was quite the casting coup. 
The Duchess of Cornwall happily took the starring role in an impromptu shadow puppet show, as she showed off her skills in a short play. 
Wielding a shadow puppet of her own, she gamely moved its limbs as a cast of three told the story of a Princess kidnapped by an ogre and saved by heroic monkey warriors. 
The Duchess was visiting the Teochew Puppet and Opera House, which aims to preserve traditional skills from its home in Penang, Malaysia. 
Greeted by Ling Goh, founder and director of museum, and assistant director Chai Lin, the Duchess posed for a photograph with the ladies in traditional dress. The Duchess of Cornwall with a puppet used during performances at the Teochew Puppet and Opera House in Penang, Malaysia Credit: Tim Rooke/REX/Shutterstock 
M oving inside, she was shown instruments including cymbals and drums, asking how they were made. 
Told Ling Glh's family had been puppeteers for five generations, she exclaimed: "It's a family affair." Camilla poses with women in traditional dress at the Teochew Puppet and Opera House Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
D irected to a table, she was shown shadow puppets and, when invited, picked one up to see how it worked. 
Pauline Fan, creative director of cultural organisation Pusaka explained that the story had been adapted from the Ramayana ancient Indian folk tale Rama and Sita. Camilla was visiting the Teochew Puppet and Opera House in Penang Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
T he Malaysian version tells the story of a Princess, played by the Duchess' puppet, who is kidnapped by an ogre king. Instructed by her beloved, she is eventually saved by an army of monkey warriors. 
T he Duchess appeared to thoroughly enjoy herself, gamely moving the puppets' arms to play along. Camilla looks to be enjoying herself as she moves the puppets Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
S he then moved to listen to a yang quing instrument being played and admire ornate opera headdresses, before sitting down to take in a puppet show from the professionals. 
Afterwards, she was given a second try at joining in, this time with a stringed puppet. 
Successfully manipulating its limbs with the string, she appeared pleased and surprised, telling onlookers: "I could've been a puppeteer." The Duchess of Cornwall with performers at the Teochew Puppet and Opera House Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
T he Duchess later moved to the cool shade of the China House cafe, a favourite Penang haunt for visitors including Julie Walters, who became a regular while filming Indian Summers in the region. 
She was shown the cafe's extraordinary selection of around 40 different cakes, before sitting down with local craftswomen to learn about their skill. 
Pulling up a chair next to Lilian Tong, director of the Pinang Peranakan Mansion, the Duchess watched as they deftly embroidered a beaded pattern in a frame. Camilla tries her hand at embroidery on her visit to China House in George Town, Penang Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
"It's very good," she said. "So impressive. My husband [the Prince of Wales] started a school for traditional arts and now it's scattered in different countries. 
"I hope they'll have it here because it conserves there traditions. It's so lovely to see this, this lovely work still being done." 
P articularly taken with a pair of tiny embroidered slipper-like shoes, she told Mrs Tong: "I love bead work, I always have it on my clothes. It's a great favourite of mine." Camilla takes part in the traditional puppet show Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
O ffered the chance to do some sewing of her own, she tried to do a tentative stitch before apologising for forgetting her glasses. "I'm sorry I don't have my glasses, but even if I did have them I'm not a very good sewer," she said. 
The Duchess also tried her hand at batik painting, creating the beginning of a blue flower while she asked about the coloured ink artists were using. 
As her husband embarked his own programme of events focused on heritage and the environment, she took a moment to pause for a cup of tea at China House before an evening reception. Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall and Prince Charles at the Sri Mahamariamman Temple Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
E arlier, the Royal couple walked the "Street of Harmony" in Penang, where they spent time at four religious houses and joined in with some of their traditions. 
They included St George’s Church, the oldest Anglican Church in South East Asia, a Muslim mosque where they met leaders and planted a tree, a Teochew temple where they watched a colourful lion dance, and a Hindu temple where they were adorned with garlands and shawls woven with golden thread. 
T he visit was intended to show the religious diversity of Malaysia, showing how different faiths can live in peace and prosperity. The Prince of Wales and The Duchess of Cornwall during a visit to Han Jiang Temple Credit: Yui Mok/PA 
T he half-a-mile road known as the Street of Harmony , it reflects the migrant communities which moved to Penang during the British Administration when it was a bustling trading port. 
The visit, undertaken at a humid 28C, saw the Prince keep cool in a linen suit while the Duchess wore a tunic, loose trousers and parasol. 
She adorned a headscarf to enter the Kapitan Keling Mosque, to meet an elder Imam and admire the architecture. Camilla arrives at the Kapitan Keling Mosque Credit: Chris Jackson/Getty 
I t was once suggested that the Prince hoped to be "Defender of Faith", when King, reflecting the his wish to celebrate and promote religious tolerance. 
In 2015, it was confirmed he would stick to the name of "Defender of the Faith" , when he eventually becomes head of the Church of England in a tradition dating back to Henry VIII. 
The Prince and Duchess first stopped at the church, which dates back to 1818 and was all-but destroyed by the Japanese in December 1941. The Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall accompanied by Bishop Charles Samuel Credit: Yui Mok/PA 
M any of the treasures inside were looted, including a baptism font made from local marble that had been in the church. 
It was discovered 30 years later on a rubbish tip in nearby Butterworth, slightly chipped but still intact, and is now back at its original home and used every week for baptisms. 
I n 2007, St George’s Church underwent a major restoration and was subsequently declared one of the 50 National Treasures of Malaysia. The Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall during a visit to St George’s Church - the oldest Anglican Church in South East Asia Credit: Yui Mok/PA 
A memorial pavilion was erected in 1886 in memory of Captain Francis Light, founder of Penang, which the couple explored before they left. 
At their second visit, they were greeted by small children with colourful dress and flowers at the mosque, before taking their shoes off to go inside. 
Speaking to the oldest surviving Imam, the Prince and Duchess learned about the history of the mosque, stepping outside to meet local Muslims and ceremonially plant an olive tree. Prince Charles and Camilla's tour of Asia gallery puff 
A t the third venue, Han Jiang Ancestral Temple the Prince and Duchess were charmed by a colourful and noisy lion dance, later posing with them for a photograph. 
The temple is dedicated to the Taoist God of the North and is still used today to honour the ancestors of the clan, winning the Unesco Asia Pacific Award for Cultural Heritage Conservation after a 2005 restoration. 
At Sri Mahamariamman Temple, the Prince and Duchess were taken on a procession led by a drummer, to see the brightly coloured building, flowers and statues of gods in all their glory. Camilla Duchess of cornwall 
H onoured with garlands made of sandalwood, they waved to the crowds before taking their leave. 
P reveena Balakrishnan, a local historian, said: "We wanted to have a fragrant garland so we chose sandal wood, flower garlands will fade and die. 
"The silk shawls are given to Kings and Queens and we believe silk has the power to attract positive vibes." Related Topics

posts.author: Ataner Yüce
posts.title: Türkiye’de 2 milyondan fazla kişi yer değiştirdi … En fazla göç eden gençler oldu
posts.text:
Türk savunma sanayi Tayland’da göz dolduruyor Türkiye’de 2 milyondan fazla kişi yer değiştirdi … En fazla göç eden gençler oldu 
Türkiye’de geçen yıl 2 milyon 619 bin 403 kişinin bulunduğu ilden ayrılarak başka bir şehre göç ettiği belirlendi. Bu nüfusun yüzde 48,9’unu erkekler, yüzde 51,1’ini ise kadınlar oluşturdu. Interpress’in “Dünya Şehircilik Günü” nedeniyle Adrese Dayalı Nüfus Kayıt Sistemi sonuçlarından derlediği verilere göre, ülkemizde, 2016 yılında en fazla göç hareketliliğinin, 549 bin 459 kişiyle 20 ila […] 07 Kasım 2017 - 11:09 'de eklendi ve 27 kez görüntülendi. tweetle Türkiye’de geçen yıl 2 milyon 619 bin 403 kişinin bulunduğu ilden ayrılarak başka bir şehre göç ettiği belirlendi. Bu nüfusun yüzde 48,9’unu erkekler, yüzde 51,1’ini ise kadınlar oluşturdu. 
Interpress’in “ Dünya Şehircilik Günü ” nedeniyle Adrese Dayalı Nüfus Kayıt Sistemi sonuçlarından derlediği verilere göre, ülkemizde, 2016 yılında en fazla göç hareketliliğinin, 549 bin 459 kişiyle 20 ila 24 yaş arasındaki gençlerde gerçekleştiği tespit edildi. 
Göç eden kadınların yüzde 23’ünün, erkeklerin ise yüzde 18,8’inin bu yaş grubunda olduğu görüldü. Göç hareketliliğinin en fazla olduğu diğer yaş grubunun ise 393 bin 556 kişi ile 15-19 yaş grubu olduğu belirlendi. 
İstanbul, Ankara ve İzmir’e en çok nereden göç var … İstanbul’a göç edenlerin doğum yeri incelendiğinde, en çok yüzde 18,1 ile diğer illerde yaşayan İstanbul doğumluların göç ettiği görüldü. 
İstanbul doğumluları sırasıyla; yüzde 3,4 ile Van, yüzde 2,9 ile Tokat, yüzde 2,8 ile Ankara ve yüzde 2,5 ile Mardin doğumlular izledi. Ankara’ya ise yüzde 20,7 ile diğer illerde yaşayan Ankara doğumlulardan sonra en çok; yüzde 5 ile İstanbul, yüzde 4,6 ile Çorum, yüzde 4,5 ile Yozgat ve yüzde 2,6 ile Kırıkkale doğumlular göç etti. 
İzmir’e en çok yüzde 19,2 ile diğer illerde yaşayan İzmir doğumlular göç ederken, bunu sırasıyla yüzde 6,4 ile İstanbul, yüzde 5 ile Manisa, yüzde 4,1 ile Ankara ve yüzde 3,4 ile Mardin doğumluların izlediği görüldü. 
En çok lise mezunları göç etti…. Türkiye’de 2016 yılında iller arası göç edenlerin eğitim durumu incelendiğinde ise yüzde 33,4 ile en çok lise ve dengi okul mezunlarının göç ettiği belirlendi. 
Lise mezunlarını sırasıyla; yüzde 24,3 ile yüksekokul veya fakülte mezunları, yüzde 13,9 ile ilkokul mezunları ve yüzde 10 ile ilköğretim mezunları takip etti. Öte yandan medyaya konuyla ilgili 800 binden fazla haber yansıdığı tespit edildi.

thread.title_full: FRSiH 2017: Pojęcie ‘żywność funkcjonalna’ nie zachęci konsumentów do zakupu

posts.title: FRSiH 2017: Pojęcie ‘żywność funkcjonalna’ nie zachęci konsumentów do zakupu
posts.text:
IFM Electronic na FRSiH: Automatyzacja przyczyni się do rozwoju kolejnych procesów 
Czym w świetle prawa jest żywność funkcjonalna i superfoods? Czy możemy spodziewać się nowych regulacji w tym zakresie? - Prawnicy zawsze przyglądają się rzeczywistości i starają się tą rzeczywistość ubrać w słowa. Zwykle są spóźnieni o wiele wiele lat w stosunku do tej rzeczywistości, bo zanim znajdą dobre definicje, upływa wiele czasu. W związku z tym, nie możemy poszukiwać definicji żywności funkcjonalnej w przepisach prawa – mówiła. 
Dodała, że można poszukiwać takich definicji w pewnych raportach, które omawiają rzeczywistość. 
- W tej chwili jakąś kategorią prawną jest żywność wzbogacona o minerały i witaminy, mamy również suplementy diety – powiedziała Aleksandra Wędrychowska-Karpińska. 
Czy powinna powstać definicja żywności funkcjonalnej? - To nie jest to pojęcie, które w przyszłości będzie zachęcało klientów do zakupu, nie podkreśla wzbogacenia żywności o dodatkowe minerały czy witaminy, tylko wręcz przeciwnie – budzi jakiś niepokój. Natomiast z całą pewnością prędzej czy później zetkniemy się z koniecznością bliższej regulacji, dostosowania zwłaszcza w zakresie reklamy przepisów tak, aby można zawsze mówić o tej żywności w sposób zupełnie prawdziwy, aby tej rzeczywistości nie zaciemniać – podkreśliła mecenas. 
- Jeżeli chodzi o promocję superfoods, to z całą pewnością powstaje duża pokusa, aby sporo takich dodatkowych oświadczeń, zapewnień złożyć przy okazji promocji tej szczególnej żywności bardzo mocno nasyconej dodatkowymi elementami żywnościowymi – dodała. 
Materiał chroniony prawem autorskim - zasady przedruków określa regulamin . WIĘCEJ INFORMACJI

thread.title: Dalmatiner Welpen
thread.title_full: Dalmatiner Welpen

posts.title: Dalmatiner Welpen
posts.text:
Wunderschöne Dalmatiner Welpen aus liebevoller Aufzucht aus toller Verpaarung! Unsere Dalmatiner eignen sich besonders als Sport und Familien Hunde! Unsere Dalmatiner Hündin hat am 4.10.2017 gesunde und schöne Welpen zur Welt gebracht. Unsere Welpen werden rund um die Uhr liebevoll betreut und wachsen mit Familienanschluss bei uns im Welpenzimmer im Haus auf. Die Welpen haben einen sehr engen Kontakt zu unserer Familie und lernen dadurch bereits die veschiedensten Geräusche des Alltags, z.B. Staubsauger, Fernseher, Telefon, Klingel, Rasenmäher, und zusätzlich bieten wir unseren Welpen täglich eine abwechslungsreiche Aufzucht, mit Kindern, anderen Hunden und tollen Spielgeräte. Die Welpen sind bis zur Abgabe bestens für ihr zukünftiges Leben im neuen Heim ausgerüstet. Die Kleinen sind tierärztlich untersucht und 2 - 3 mal entwurmt! Unsere Zuchtstätte unterliegt einem strengen Dachverband und wird von geprüften Zuchtwarte kontrolliert (erforderliche genetische Gesundheitstests). Die Eltern besitzen beide eine Zuchtzulassung und Stammbäume (Ankörung) und aufwendige genetische Untersuchungen (Labogen).Stammbaum - Ahnenpass wird von Anerkannter Zuchtverein ausgestellt. Die Welpen werden alle audiometrisch getestet (Taubheit/Gehör) und erhalten ein Zeugnis von der Untersuchung und sind alle mit einem Chip versehen und erhalten mit 8 Wochen die erste Grundimmunisierung und einen tollen Stammbaum. Unsere Zuchtstätte wird aus einem seriösen Verband in der Schweiz abgenommen. 
Wir sind im Zughundesport aktiv und beschäftigen unsere Hunde täglich mit viel Sport, Spiel und Spass. 
Mutter : Zughundesport Kategorie zwei Hunde 1. Rang 2016, Baronessa - Bashira V1 offene Klasse

thread.title: Oulun kaupunki Cup
thread.title_full: Oulun kaupunki Cup | Gymner

posts.author: Anonyymi
posts.text:
""oliko tiukka tuomarilinja? aika kovia pisteitä k14-16"
Hyvin löysä linja 10-12, 12-14K ja 14-16K. 8-10v linja realistisempi.
Monilla nousi kategoria jopa kolmella edellisistä kisoista ja yleisesti hyvin harva suoritus oli omalle tasolle onnistunut. Cirrusksella siisti ja onnistunut suoritus, muita ei tule mieleen.
14-16K kaikilla joukkueilla minun silmään huono suoritus: välineen tiputuksia, solmuja, heitot ei onnistu yms."
Välineen tiputuksesta tulee kuitenkin vain 0.1 vähennys parhaimmillaan, jos yksi sellainen tulee niin siinä ei paljoa kokonaispisteet tipu. Osittain kuitenkin samaa mieltä, suorituspisteet melko korkeita, tekninen ja taiteellinen ihan linjassa.

posts.title: شركة "طلعت مصطفى" تنفي مساهمة الوليد بن طلال في مشروعاتها
posts.text: شركة "طلعت مصطفى" تنفي مساهمة الوليد بن طلال في مشروعاتها الثلاثاء 07/نوفمبر/2017 - 10:56 ص نيفين سمير أعلنت مجموعة طلعت مصطفي القابضة أنه لايوجد مساهمات مع الوليد ابن طلال أو شركة المملكة القابضة في أى من شركات مجموعة طلعت مصطفي القابضة أو الشركات التابعة لها. وأوضحت الشركة في بيان للبورصة اليوم الثلاثاء، أنه قد تم تمويل ماتم انفاقة على مشروع فور سيزون شرم الشيخ 213 مليون دولار من المصادر التمويلية الذاتية من المجموعة. وأضافت أنه سيتم تمويل المبلغ المتبقي والبالغ 170 مليون دولار لانهاء المشروع، وذلك أيضا من مصادر التمويل الذاتية للمشروع. كما أعلنت الشركة المصرية لمدينة الانتاج الاعلامي في بيان منفصل للبورصة أنه لاتوجد مساهمات أو استثمارات الوليد بن طلال والشيخ صالح كامل داخل الشركة وأن العلاقة بين الشركة وبينهم تقتصر فقط على تأجير عدد من الاستديوهات بالشركة وأنهم ملتزمين بالسداد، مضيفة أن جميع الاستثمارات الموجودة مملوكة بالكامل للشركة ومساهميها. وكان‏ العاهل السعودي الملك سلمان بن عبدالعزيز أصدر مساء السبت الماضي، أمراً ملكياً بتشكيل لجنة عليا برئاسة ولي العهد الأمير محمد بن سلمان وعضوية رئيس هيئة الرقابة والتحقيق ورئيس الهيئة الوطنية لمكافحة الفساد ورئيس ديوان المراقبة العامة والنائب العام ورئيس أمن الدولة.وتضمنت مسؤوليات اللجنة حصر المخالفات والجرائم والأشخاص والكيانات ذات العلاقة في قضايا الفساد العام والتحقيق، وإصدار أوامر القبض، والمنع من السفر، وكشف الحسابات والمحافظ وتجميدها، وتتبع الأموال والأصول ومنع نقلها أو تحويلها من قبل الأشخاص والكيانات أياً كانت صفتها، وللجنة الحق في اتخاذ أي إجراءات احترازية تراها حتى تتم إحالتها إلى جهات التحقيق أو الجهات القضائية بحسب الأحوال.واتخاذ ما يلزم مع المتورطين في قضايا الفساد العام واتخاذ ما تراه بحق الأشخاص والكيانات والأموال والأصول الثابتة والمنقولة في الداخل والخارج وإعادة الأموال للخزينة العامة للدولة وتسجيل الممتلكات والأصول باسم عقارات الدولة، ولها تقرير ما تراه محققاً للمصلحة العامة خاصة مع الذين أبدوا تجاوبهم معها.هذا وذكرت وسائل إعلام سعودية توقيف عدداً من الأمراء والوزراء والمسؤولين، كما نقلت وكالة رويترز عن مسؤول سعودي كبير أن الأمير الوليد بن طلال ووزير المالية السابق إبراهيم العساف قيد الاحتجاز ويخضعان للتحقيق في المملكة العربية السعودية.

thread.title: $152.70 Million in Sales Expected for Hecla Mining Company (HL) This Quarter
thread.title_full: $152.70 Million in Sales Expected for Hecla Mining Company (HL) This Quarter

posts.author: Shane Hupp
posts.title: $152.70 Million in Sales Expected for Hecla Mining Company (HL) This Quarter
posts.text:
Tweet 
Analysts expect Hecla Mining Company (NYSE:HL) to report sales of $152.70 million for the current quarter, Zacks Investment Research reports. Three analysts have issued estimates for Hecla Mining’s earnings. The highest sales estimate is $168.60 million and the lowest is $143.48 million. Hecla Mining reported sales of $179.39 million during the same quarter last year, which indicates a negative year-over-year growth rate of 14.9%. The company is scheduled to issue its next quarterly earnings results before the market opens on Tuesday, November 7th. 
On average, analysts expect that Hecla Mining will report full year sales of $152.70 million for the current year, with estimates ranging from $573.39 million to $711.60 million. For the next fiscal year, analysts expect that the company will report sales of $740.36 million per share, with estimates ranging from $637.78 million to $843.10 million. Zacks Investment Research’s sales averages are a mean average based on a survey of research analysts that follow Hecla Mining. Get Hecla Mining Company alerts: 
A number of research firms have recently weighed in on HL. HC Wainwright restated a “buy” rating and issued a $8.50 price target on shares of Hecla Mining in a report on Friday. TheStreet lowered shares of Hecla Mining from a “b-” rating to a “c” rating in a research report on Thursday, August 3rd. ValuEngine raised shares of Hecla Mining from a “sell” rating to a “hold” rating in a research report on Friday, September 1st. Canaccord Genuity reaffirmed a “hold” rating and issued a $5.25 price objective on shares of Hecla Mining in a research report on Friday, October 6th. Finally, BMO Capital Markets reaffirmed a “hold” rating and issued a $6.00 price objective on shares of Hecla Mining in a research report on Wednesday, September 20th. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, five have given a hold rating and two have issued a buy rating to the company. The stock has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average price target of $6.52. 
Shares of Hecla Mining ( HL ) opened at $4.51 on Tuesday. Hecla Mining has a 1-year low of $4.43 and a 1-year high of $7.64. The firm has a market cap of $1,775.63, a PE ratio of 44.50, a PEG ratio of 85.58 and a beta of 0.31. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.34, a current ratio of 2.56 and a quick ratio of 2.14. 
In other Hecla Mining news, Director George R. Nethercutt, Jr. sold 62,500 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Friday, October 13th. The shares were sold at an average price of $5.24, for a total transaction of $327,500.00. The transaction was disclosed in a document filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which can be accessed through this link . Company insiders own 1.50% of the company’s stock. 
A number of institutional investors and hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of HL. Ameriprise Financial Inc. raised its position in Hecla Mining by 27.8% during the 1st quarter. Ameriprise Financial Inc. now owns 20,159 shares of the basic materials company’s stock worth $106,000 after buying an additional 4,384 shares during the last quarter. Trexquant Investment LP purchased a new position in Hecla Mining during the 2nd quarter worth approximately $124,000. Pacad Investment Ltd. raised its position in Hecla Mining by 10.4% during the 2nd quarter. Pacad Investment Ltd. now owns 27,500 shares of the basic materials company’s stock worth $140,000 after buying an additional 2,600 shares during the last quarter. Advisor Group Inc. raised its position in Hecla Mining by 148.1% during the 2nd quarter. Advisor Group Inc. now owns 27,741 shares of the basic materials company’s stock worth $142,000 after buying an additional 16,561 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Virtu Financial LLC purchased a new position in Hecla Mining during the 2nd quarter worth approximately $143,000. 59.34% of the stock is owned by institutional investors. 
About Hecla Mining 
Hecla Mining Company is engaged in discovering, acquiring, developing and producing silver, gold, lead and zinc. The Company and its subsidiaries provide precious and base metals to the United States and around the world. It produces lead, zinc and bulk concentrates, which it markets to custom smelters and brokers, and unrefined bullion bars (dore) containing gold and silver.
